outputs.output_descr:
The three components of the project directly contribute to the realization of key interventions outlined in the umbrella programme:
- Improving the volunteer infrastructure and volunteer management capacity in Beijing
- Supporting volunteer activities to meet sustainable development goals
- Promoting international exchanges on volunteering for development

The project includes 3 key components:
- Nurturing Program for Rapid Growth of 500 Volunteer Involving Organisations in Shanghai
- Pilot Initiatives of Voluntary Service to Improve Medical and Public Health Systems in less advanced region 
- enhance volunteering networking and experiences sharing regionally and globally

project_descr: The overall aim of this programme is to support the development of national and local volunteer infrastructures in China to promote people's participation in social management and scale up volunteerism in China's new development stage.
project_title: Umbrella Prog on volunteerism for development
